messages.content: The Labour party of my youth has gone, with socialist policies made illegal by Mrs Thatcher's Maastricht Treaty. The Labour Party is now the same as the Conservative in both policies and candidates. That is why we must vote UKIP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only UKIP can deliver on the promise of British jobs for British workers. If a person has made a commitment to Britain then Britain should make a commitment to them.
A fairer tax system, raising the tax allowance so that those on minimum wage pay no tax.

issues.brexitEurope: I want us to be out of Europe, out of the euro and out of the EU, making our own laws and saving our independence.
issues.governance: The Labour party of my youth has gone, with socialist policies made illegal by Mrs Thatcher's Maastricht Treaty. The Labour Party is now the same as the Conservative in both policies and candidates.
issues.immigration: If a person has made a commitment to Britain then Britain should make a commitment to them and give the British preference over EU immigrants.

images.caption: Election communication for the UK Independence Party
